name: Blob-Bounce
description:
Blob-Bounce is a game where you move your tank around, blowing up blobs with cannonballs, all while trying not to attract the attention of the magnetic mines.

To play Blob-Bounce, use the W, A, S and D keys or the arrow keys for movement, the SPACE bar to shoot P to pause the game and Esc to get back to the main menu.

This game is currently in Beta version. Most of it works. Please log any issues with the issues tracker on GitLab.
